snippet: A push to repeat the bipartisanship of last year's State of the Union address.
abstract: A push to repeat the bipartisanship of last year's State of the Union address.
lead_paragraph: A year ago, as Washington grappled with the shooting rampage that nearly took the life of Representative Gabrielle Giffords, the centrist group Third Way made a modest suggestion to members of Congress: Mingle with lawmakers from the opposite party at the State of the Union address.
